About

WebPageTest Newsletter is a free Web application to monitor the Web Performance of web pages in an automated way through the delivery of a weekly report (Core Web Vitals metrics included) to its Subscribers.

The report delivered is generated using one of the best web optimization tools on the market such as Webpagetest.org.

Featured Users

Web Performance Report

Web page test details.

Url page. Test location. Test Id. View third-party assets requests on the page.

Web Optimization Scores.

Grades for the most critical performance optimizations.

Core Web Vitals.

UX Metrics for loading, visual stability, and interactivity.

Web Performance Results.

High-level metrics information about the page that was tested.

Content Breakdown.

Website content breakdown by MIME type.
